abstract: Kleenex packages made to look like slices of watermelon, orange or lime are meant to keep the product “relevant” when it is not cold and flu season.
snippet: Kleenex packages made to look like slices of watermelon, orange or lime are meant to keep the product “relevant” when it is not cold and flu season.
lead_paragraph: SALES of facial tissue during the cold and flu season are, appropriately enough, feverish, but not so during the summer. In the four weeks that ended July 12, 2009, for example, revenue for the products totaled $57.8 million, compared with $92.4 million in the four weeks ending Jan. 24, 2010, a difference of nearly 60 percent, according to SymphonyIRI Group, a market research company whose data does not include Wal-Mart sales.

headline.main: A Sharp Focus on Design When the Package Is Part of the Product
headline.print_headline: A Sharp Focus on Design When the Package Is Part of the Product
